Außenspiegel asphärisch, links

Multi-Media-Interface MMI Basic Plus / MMI Radio Plus

6 Lautsprecher

trans:
Seat belt occupancy detection
Roof spoiler S-line
Sport-Design (S-line)
Metallic paintwork
Door sill trims with aluminum inlay and logo, illuminated
Pedals and footrest in stainless steel
Headlining in black fabric
Emblems
LIGHT & SIGHT
LED headlights and LED rear lights with dynamic turn signals, rear
Daytime running lights
Light and rain sensor
Electrically adjustable, heated and folding exterior mirrors with automatic dimming and automatic curb function
Interior mirror with automatic dimming
Convex exterior mirror, right
Aspherical exterior mirror, left
LED rear lights with dynamic turn signals
ENTERTAINMENT
Digital instrument cluster (virtual cockpit plus)
MMI navigation plus with MMI touch
Satellite navigation system High
Digital radio receiver (DAB)
Audi connect (emergency and assistance system)
Bluetooth universal interface
Audi connect Internet-based services
MMI basic plus / MMI radio plus multimedia interface
MMI radio plus
6 loudspeakers
ASSISTANCE SYSTEMS & SAFETY
Park assist
Driver assistance system: Adaptive cruise control with automatic distance control
Rearview camera
Driver assistance system: Lane departure warning system
Speed limitation system
Speed limiter system
Tire pressure control system
Brake assist (Audi pre sense front)
Start/stop system with recuperation
Child lock electrically operated
Driver assistance system: start-off assistant (hold assist)
Collision avoidance assist
Legal emergency call
Multifunction camera
Seat occupancy sensor
Turn assistant
Head restraints, front
Head airbag system (sideguard)
Front side airbag in center (interactive airbag)
Deactivatable airbag on passenger side
Pedestrian protection system
Electro-mechanical parking brake
COMFORT
Panoramic glass sunroof
“Keyless Go” central locking
Seat heating
Ambient lighting (multicolor LED)
Electric auxiliary air heater
